comment_text: Working as a foreigner in SA... There is a big shortage of good developers here, trust me. And many companies are willing to help out with getting a Visa. Might not be as fancy and "*.io"-domained as the US/EU jobs, but they're there and willing to hire anyone that is good.
author: zo1
story_title: Ask HN: If I were your dream hire, would you hire me? I live in Somalia
